changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO POKEMON_ATTACK (pokemon_id, attack_id) VALUES ((SELECT ID FROM POKEMON WHERE ID = 1),(SELECT ID FROM ATTACK WHERE NAME = 'Tackle')); INSERT INTO POKEMON_ATTACK (pokemon_id, attack_id) VALUES ((SELECT ID FROM POKEMON WHERE ID = 1),(SELECT ID FROM ATTACK WHERE NAME = 'Vine Whip'));
